That option-pass turnover aside, this #Browns offense is playing some of its finest football yet under Freddie Kitchens. Wild three back sets with Mayfield under center and a rash of excellent throws by Baker.
Baker Mayfield right now: 12-of-12 passing for 165 yards with two touchdown strikes. Easily his strongest work as a rookie. Best half of the year by the #Browns offense.
Who would have guessed the most creative play-caller on Cleveland's staff wasn't the exiled Hue Jackson or Todd Haley -- but Freddie Kitchens?
This #Browns performance doubles as an ultra-effective recruiting advertisement as John Dorsey searches for Cleveland's next coach.

Dead-quiet stairways beside metropolitan homefronts of the west. City vehicles to nowhere. Pressing  silence. Eras of nothingness. And then saw you by the water along the hushed Pacific where you walked alone heartbroken.
